active_projects.description: Implement the .opencode system upgrade plan following specs/agent_system_upgrade_plan.md and specs/implementation_roadmap.md. This 6-week upgrade involves 4 phases: Phase 1 (Week 1): Foundation - file-based metadata exchange and state management; Phase 2 (Week 2): Workflow Ownership Migration - transfer postflight responsibilities to subagents; Phase 3 (Weeks 3-4): Meta System Builder Port - enable dynamic system extension; Phase 4 (Weeks 5-6): Forked Subagent Pattern - achieve token efficiency.
